Lua 5.1.4 binaries compiled with VS2010

These binaries and static library were compiled using Visual Studio 2010 on
5/3/2010 by Bob Somers. I do not claim any ownership to the source code, I'm
merely distributing binaries under the terms of Lua's MIT license. Copyright
information has been included.

More info can be found at: http://sigttou.com/lua-visual-studio-2010
